## ðŸ¤ª Overview

`Shennong` is a toolkit for interpreting omics data and maintained by [Songqi Duan](https://songqi.org).

## ðŸ“¦ Installation

Install the latest version from [GitHub](https://github.com/catplot/shennong) as follow:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
if (!require(devtools)) install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("catplot/shennong")
```
